</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the object position. The pos array uses the [[PositionASL]] format. The version of the command does not offset based on object center. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Warning </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command was deactivated and has no effect. Use [[setPosWorld]] instead.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> obj [[setPosASL2]] pos</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _aslPos = [[getPosASL]] [[player]];
_aslPos set [1, _aslPos [[select]] 1 + 10];
[[player]] [[setPosASL2]] _aslPos;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setPosWorld]] [[getPosWorld]] [[setPosASL]] [[getPosASL]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
